can you please add another test just below, to demonstrate that the `{}` is no longer needed:
```
assert(q"class C extends $parent".syntax == "class C extends _root_.scala.AnyVal")
```
maybe add it in a few other places, too.
Added! It wasn't tested anywhere else though.
because it wasn't possible before your change

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2318,2322 @@    val parent = init"_root_.scala.AnyVal"
    val template = template"$parent"
    assert(q"class C $template".syntax == "class C extends _root_.scala.AnyVal")
    assert(q"class C extends $parent {}".syntax == "class C extends _root_.scala.AnyVal")
    assert(q"class C extends $parent".syntax == "class C extends _root_.scala.AnyVal")
